titles.title: TV Yarou Nanana: Wakuwaku Doukutsu Land
Wacky TV Nanana S2
テレビ野郎 ナナーナ わくわく洞窟ランド

relatedanime.anime: TV Yarou Nanana: Kaibutsu Kraken o Oe!

anime.description: TV Na Na Na, a dirt-poor television network, is bought out by the major streaming service Nanazon Prime Video... and the bigwigs of Nanazon waste no time laying off staff on a massive scale! The first ones they target are the Expedition Team, whose members succeeded in filming the legendary beast Kiina, because they haven`t produced any hit programs since the Kiina story. So to avoid being laid off, the director Nanaoka, cameraman Nanamori, and assistant director Nanayama kick off an ambitious new program idea that major networks had sunk small fortunes into before and failed: to discover the buried treasure of the Banakawa House and broadcast it on TV. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 買収! テレビ野郎
Wacky TV, Bought Out!
Baishuu! TV Yarou
episode.summary: When a small-time TV station, TV Nanana, gets bought out by a major online streaming company a crew that works on documentary-style programming has to scramble to save their jobs. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 極秘! 不可能なミッション
Top Secret! Mission Impossible
Gokuhi! Fukanou na Mission
episode.summary: The expedition crew start (literally) digging into the case of a buried treasure that was supposedly hidden away by the Banagawa shogunate, hundreds of years ago. Will this wild goose chase net them enough ratings to save them from the corporate overlords at Nanazon? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 掘削! 黄金伝説の山
Excavation! The Mountain with Legendary Gold
Kussaku! Ougon Densetsu no Yama
episode.summary: While digging in pursuit of the Banagawa shogunate`s hidden treasure, the crew has an unexpected encounter. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 執念! あきらめの悪い俳優
Obsession! The Actor Who Didn`t Know When to Stop
Shuunen! Akirame no Warui Haiyuu
episode.summary: Can the TV Nanana crew come to an agreement with the actor who has been searching for the Banagawa buried treasure for years? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 巧妙! 幕府が仕掛けた罠
Cunning? Traps Set by the Bakufu
Koumyou! Bakufu ga Shikaketa Wana
episode.summary: Deadly traps await the expedition crew as they venture beyond a hidden door that will lead them to the buried treasure. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 救出! 憧れのギョーカイ人
Salvation! Meeting Someone in Showbiz
Kyuushutsu! Akogare no Gyoukaijin
episode.summary: Nanayama has fallen into a trap, and is left dangling by a thread. His only hope is a resident of the caves who seems a little distracted... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 定額! 海外ドラマ見放題
A Fixed Price! On-Demand Foreign TV
Teigaku! Kaigai Drama Mihoudai
episode.summary: Nanayama finds a lead on the location of the buried treasure, but his guide seems to lose interest in escorting him when the promise of binge-watching some TV enters the equation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 孤独! 洞窟のグルメ
Lonely! The Cave Gourmet
Kodoku! Doukutsu no Gourmet
episode.summary: As the crew stops for a meal during their underground exploration, Nanamori marvels at the intricacies of an impromptu bowl of cave cuisine. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 前進! 七岡探検隊
Onward! Nanaoka`s Expedition Crew
Zenshin! Nanaoka Tankentai
episode.summary: The expedition crew continues their subterranean quest with a sudden burst of musical inspiration putting a spring in their step. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 襲来! 恐怖の黒い敵
Onslaught! A Dark, Terrifying Enemy
Shuurai! Kyoufu no Kuroi Teki
episode.summary: The expedition crew is confronted by a maniacal vampire bat prince, but they`re not sure he`s intimidating enough to thrill their viewership watching at home. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 窮地! 極寒の氷洞穴
Danger! The Freezing Ice Cavern
Kyuuchi! Gokkan no Koori Douketsu
episode.summary: Nanana II 11: Chased by a colony of ravenous bats intent on making them into an impromptu lunch, the expedition crew discover a frozen cave. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暴走! 地底の秘密列車
Out of Control! The Subterranean Railway
Bousou! Chitei no Himitsu Ressha
episode.summary: The hunt for the buried treasure leads Nanaoka and his crew to a railway that they hope will take them directly to their goal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 出現! 幻のバナ川幕府
Arrival! Phantoms of The Banagawa Shogunate
Shutsugen! Maboroshi no Banagawa Bakufu
episode.summary: The crew arrives at a mysterious castle filled with oddly familiar figures. Is the buried treasure finally within their grasp? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無念! テレビマンの最期
Tragedy! Death of a TV Crew
Munen! TV Man no Saigo
episode.summary: Having been captured by the mechanical minions of the Banagawa bakufu, things are looking grim for the TV Nanana crew. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 軽快! 踊るくノ一
Glorious! The Kunoichi Dances
Keikai! Odoru Kunoichi
episode.summary: The Expedition crew are recruited for a task that`s a little outside of their typical job description: assassination! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 痛快! 風雲バナ川城
Thrills! Stormy Clouds Over Banagawa Castle
Tsuukai! Fuuun Banagawa-jou
episode.summary: Guided by the mole kunoichi, Shichiko, the team from TV Nanana storm the castle of the Banagawa shogunate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 打倒! カラクリ将軍
Rebellion! Against the Mechanical Shogun
Datou! Karakuri Shougun
episode.summary: The expedition crew finally make their way inside of Banagawa castle, where they confront the tyrannical machine shogun. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 仰天! スゴ腕のAD
Astonishment! The AD with the Super Skill
Gyouten! Sugoude no AD
episode.summary: As the battle between the mole kunoichi and machine shogun intensifies, one of the expedition crew unveils an unexpected talent to save the day. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 潜入! 巨大天守閣
Infiltration! The Giant Tower
Sennyuu! Kyodai Tenshukaku
episode.summary: The expedition crew find themselves spelunking through a tower in Banagawa castle that they hope will lead them to the treasure. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妨害! 面倒な素人
Intrusion! Annoying Amateurs
Bougai! Mendou na Shirouto
episode.summary: The expedition team have finally found the Banagawa buried treasure, but some familiar faces prevent them from getting their hands on it. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 燃えよ! マッチョドラゴン
Blaze On! Macho Dragon
Moeyo! Macho Dragon
episode.summary: The crew from TV Nanana have teamed up with six-time IWGP heavyweight champion Tatsumi Fujinami to take on the meddlesome cyclops and minotaur duo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! 神獣VSプロレスラー
Clash! Holy Beast VS Pro Wrestler
Gekitotsu! Shinjuu vs Pro Wrestler
episode.summary: It`s the titanic conclusion between the colossal sized competitors who battle to determine the fate of the Banagawa bakufu`s buried treasure! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 崩落! 巨大洞窟
Collapse! In the Giant Cave
Houraku! Kyodai Doukutsu
episode.summary: Having recovered the buried treasure of the Banagawa shogunate, the TV Nanana crew now has to escape the collapsing caverns! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 解雇! テレビナナーナ探検部
Dismissed! The TV Nanana Expedition Crew
Kaiko! TV Nanana Tankenbu
episode.summary: The expedition crew have managed to return to the TV Nanana studio safely, but the buried treasure turned out to be a dead end. Will their jobs come to a dramatic end as their station is bought out by the monopolistic Nanazon Prime Video? Source: crunchyroll
